Text: Would have been nice to know this was in PAL. I can watch it on the PC. Anyone know of a good NTSC version I can get my hands on?
You could conveet it to NTSC yourself. A good idea would be to purchase a dvd player that will play both NTSC and PAL. It would open a whole new door.
